headline: Rewarding

headline: Ball of Confusion
pros: Branch offices are relaxed, good atmosphere for administrataive staff.
cons: Often conflict between sales staff and administrative staff.  Home office does not speak to other departments within the company regarding repurchase products.  Questionable hiring practices for senior management positions
